titles.title: A bill to provide that the recreation portions of the project for Cooper Lake and Channels, Texas, shall be constructed at full Federal expense.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, Army.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Provides that the recreation portions of the project for Cooper Lake and Channels, Texas, shall be constructed at full Federal expense.
